Class TwoWheeledRobot

java.lang.Object
  TwoWheeledRobot

public class TwoWheeledRobot
extends java.lang.Object

Allows the robot to be referred to as a single entity as opposed to sending messages to the 2 wheel motors. (provided in the labs, little to no change)
